021import com.google.common.io.ByteArrayDataOutput;
022import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
023
024import java.io.DataInputStream;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.util.UUID;
027
028/**
029 * BalanceMessageHandler
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @since 0.1.2.0
033 */
034public class BalanceMessageHandler extends AccountHandler {
035
036  public BalanceMessageHandler() {
037
038    super("balance");
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public void handle(final String account, final String accountName, final UUID server, final DataInputStream stream) {
043
044    try {
045      final String region = stream.readUTF();
046      final String currency = stream.readUTF();
047      final String handler = stream.readUTF();
048      final String amount = stream.readUTF();
049      send(server, account, accountName, region, currency, handler, amount);
050    } catch(IOException e) {
051      e.printStackTrace();
052    }
053  }
054
055  public static void send(final UUID server, final String account, final String accountName, final String region, final String currency, final String handler, final String amount) {
056
057    final ByteArrayDataOutput out = ByteStreams.newDataOutput();
058    out.writeUTF(server.toString());
059    out.writeUTF(account);
060    out.writeUTF(accountName);
061    out.writeUTF(region);
062    out.writeUTF(currency);
063    out.writeUTF(handler);
064    out.writeUTF(amount);
065    sendToAll("tne:balance", out, true);
066  }
067}
